item.title: December
item.description:
• Impletmented Bechno's fresh new take on the freezeFrame.js! With my own little adjustments here and there. Took a min but its here and nice and clean and easy!
  • My Pixel Art is now animation toggleable! Thanks to the previously mentioned freezeframe fiddling.
  • Did a bit of styling on the Dedan Cosplay page. It aint much but it gives it some uniqueness. Also the font is probably easier to read than my neverending serifs lmao
  • Reorganized my BBW Mists & Webrings a tad.

item.title: November 20
item.description:
• The updates section on the homepage has been made into a iframe! Was for the sake of cleanliness, that box of code is really Really long!
  • New arts!
  • My first Cosplay page is live! I want to do more styling to each individual page but thats for later. More cosplays to come as well!
  • Another day, another new B&BW mist added to the collection.
  • Put in an app for another webring :3

item.title: November 9
item.description:
We're gonna try putting html in this... Focusing on page/link/navigation cleanup today!

  • Deleted links.html. It never really served much purpose rip
  • Fancied up the links in Collections and Shrines.
  • New CSS for those links in my nav that aren't actually links so they don't look like links! (Artistry and Links)
  • Added "Back" links to some pages that needed them.
  • Changed up the links in the Shrine/Collection-Specific Navbar.
  • Also a new site in Indie Sites

item.title: November 6
item.description: Ok looks like I got this working horray! To keep it short, I've added some more Bath and Body Wroks mists I forgot to include, and fixed hopefully the last stay neocities link. I feel like I always say that and then find another... Oh! Also! A couple elements on the home page have a little "pop-up" feature now when you mouse over them! I'll figre out making it keyboard/mobile accessible here soon.

item.title: RSS Real?
item.description: Third times the charm right????? Right??????
